articles.title: Moscow court DENIES Brittney Griner's request to be released on house arrest - Daily Mail
articles.description: A Moscow court denied Brittney Griner's request to be released on house arrest Thursday, while her legal team has reportedly met with her several times a week since her detention in Russia on drug charges.
